item.title: New Container: Kali Linux
item.description: We have released a new desktop application container for: KALI Linux KALI Linux is an open-source, Debian-based Linux distribution geared towards various information security tasks, such as Penetration Testing, Security Research, Computer Forensics and Reverse Engineering.
item.content:
We have released a new desktop application container for: KALI Linux

KALI Linux is an open-source, Debian-based Linux distribution geared towards various information security tasks, such as Penetration Testing, Security Research, Computer Forensics and Reverse Engineering.
